item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hello! I am Leandro Llontop Herrera, a Mechatronics Engineer and Robotics enthusiast driven by the control of complex systems and mechatronic integration.

I am currently pursuing a Master’s in Robotics, Automation & Embedded Systems at IMT Atlantique in Nantes, France. My academic journey spans across Peru, Germany, and France, giving me a unique international perspective and a versatile problem-solving approach.

What Drives Me?

I seek to contribute to innovative projects that combine control, perception, and will change the world.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Are you looking for a Mechatronics Engineer passionate about robotics and control systems?

I am actively looking for internship opportunities (4+ months) starting in April 2025. I am eager to contribute to challenging projects involving mobile robotics, autonomous systems, or control research.

Whether you have questions about my projects, want to discuss a potential collaboration, or simply chat about Formula 1 or technology, feel free to reach out!

You can contact me directly via email or through my social media links below.
